casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shamonte Arnell GREEN. No. 345P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2006. Matthew D. Wunsche, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Green. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, Beirne M. Harding, Assistant District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of June 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2006."
